errors.error_description: The installation steps are in the wrong logical order. The `pip install` command is listed before the instruction to install the prerequisite CUDA/OpenCL/HIP compilers, which could cause the installation to fail or the package to not find the necessary backend.
correction_candidates: Swap the first two bullet points in the 'Installation' section so that compiler installation comes before the `pip install` command.
The `pip install` command will automatically install the required compilers.
The order does not matter as the package will prompt for compiler location on first run.
Combine the two steps into one command: `install-compilers && pip install kernel_tuner[...]`
errors.golden_answer: Swap the first two bullet points in the 'Installation' section so that compiler installation comes before the `pip install` command.
